meanings.definition: Relating to the senses or sensation.
meanings.sent1: The sensory experience of feeling the soft fur of a kitten is delightful.
meanings.sent2: The sensory room at the school is designed to help students with different sensory needs.
meanings.sent3: The sensory overload at the amusement park made everyone giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The sensory explosion of colors in the painting took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The sensory memory of the ocean breeze instantly brought me back to my childhood vacation.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the physical senses.
meanings.sent1: The sensory input from the hot stove warned me not to touch it.
meanings.sent2: The sensory details in the story painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent3: The sensory challenge of tasting new foods excited the young chef.
meanings.sent4: The sensory journey through the forest awakened my spirit.
meanings.sent5: The sensory impact of the loud music made my heart race with excitement.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to sensation or the physical senses.
meanings.sent1: The sensory perception of the cool breeze on my skin was refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The sensory information gathered by the brain helps us navigate the world.
meanings.sent3: The sensory exploration of different textures fascinated the curious toddler.
meanings.sent4: The sensory connection between smell and memory is powerful.
meanings.sent5: The sensory overload of the city streets overwhelmed my senses.
